rukus.text: U yake b selyshche My ne posylaly proroka, My zavzhdy vrazhaly yoho zhyteliv zlyhodnyamy y lykhom — mozhlyvo, stanutʹ smyrennymy vony

Potim My zaminyaly zlo blahom, shchob vony zaznaly dobra. Vony hovoryly: «Batʹky nashi tak samo zaznavaly prykroshchiv i radoshchiv!» Ale My skaraly yikh tak nespodivano, shcho vony tsʹoho y ne chekaly
Yakby zhyteli tsykh selyshch uviruvaly y buly bohoboyazlyvymy, My b vidkryly yim blahoslovennya nebes i zemli. Ale vony vvazhaly tse za brekhnyu, tozh My skaraly yikh za te, shcho vony sobi zdobuvaly
Nevzhe zhyteli selyshch vvazhaly, shcho Nashe pokarannya ne pryyde do nykh unochi, koly vony splyatʹ
Nevzhe zhyteli selyshch vvazhaly, shcho Nashe pokarannya ne pryyde do nykh zranku, koly vony viddayutʹsya zabavam
Nevzhe vony ne maly strakhu pered khytristyu Allaha? Ne mayutʹ strakhu pered khytristyu Allaha lyudy, yaki zaznayutʹ vtrat
